title: One Piece Episode #511 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A review of episode 511 discussing Luffy's return to Marineford with Rayleigh and Jinbe, the ringing of the Ox Bell, and the global reactions. The review praises the episode's epic feel and the way it handles major players across the world.

title: ROOKIES IN THE NEW WORLD! - One Piece Episode 511 + 512 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction and review video covering episodes 511 and 512, focusing on Luffy's return to Marineford and the Supernovas entering the New World.

title: One Piece Episode 511 Reaction
author: Dre Plays
description: A Patreon-exclusive reaction video to One Piece episode 511, featuring the reactor's response to Luffy's return to Marineford and the iconic Ox Bell scene.

title: 511-513: Unexpected Relanding! Luffy, to Marineford!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr Blog)
description: A first-time viewer's perspective on episodes 511-513, discussing Luffy's return to Marineford, Rayleigh's clever plan, and the hidden message to the Straw Hats. The blogger notes how the message was 'crafted so skillfully that this message would be different depending on which side a character was on.'

title: Episode 511 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page covering episode 511, including plot summary, character appearances, trivia, and adaptation details from Chapter 594.

title: One Piece: Why Did Luffy Ring the Ox Bell 16 Times?
author: Fiction Horizon
description: An in-depth article explaining the significance and symbolism of Luffy ringing the Ox Bell 16 times at Marineford, including the hidden message to his crew and the public interpretation as a declaration of a new era.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Explains the meaning and aftermath of the Ox Bell incident, with some spoilers through the timeskip

title: One Piece 594 - Aftermath
author: Random Curiosity
description: A blog post covering Chapter 594 (which became Episode 511), discussing the immediate reactions and fan theories about the 16 bells and Luffy's message in real-time as the chapter was released.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Manga chapter analysis that became anime episode 511
